controller

Class BrickController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BrickController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BonusBrickModel, CementBrickModel, ClayBrickModel, SlowBrickModel, SteelBrickModel, TimesaverBrickModel

    public abstract class BrickController
extends java.lang.Object
    BrickController is an Abstract Class that handles all the implementations regarding the Bricks in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BrickController

        public BrickController(java.lang.String name,
                       java.awt.Point pos,
                       java.awt.Dimension size,
                       java.awt.Color border,
                       java.awt.Color inner,
                       int strength)
        BrickController is a Parameterized Constructor that that handles the initial implementation of the brick. Sets the brick name. Sets the brick status as NOT BROKEN. Creates the brick.
        Parameters:
        name - brick name
        pos - brick position/location
        size - size of the brick
        border - brick border color
        inner - brick inner color
        strength - brick's strength

    • Method Detail

      • makeBrickFace

        protected abstract java.awt.Shape makeBrickFace(java.awt.Point pos,
                                                java.awt.Dimension size)
        makeBall is an Abstract Method which creates the ball. This method will later be implemented by the child brick classes or any other extensions the programmer wishes to add
        Parameters:
        pos - the position/location of the brick.
        size - size of the brick.
        Returns:
        returns the brick.

      • setImpact

        public abstract boolean setImpact(java.awt.geom.Point2D point,
                                  int dir)
        setImpact Method is responsible for letting know if an impact has occurred. If brick is broken, will return false. Denoting no impact made. Else, will run the impact method and after impact, return the if brick broken or not.
        Parameters:
        point - point of impact.
        dir - direction of impact.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value to state if brick is broken or not.

      • getBrick

        public abstract java.awt.Shape getBrick()
        getBrick is an Abstract Method that will be later implemented. Returns the brick shape.
        Returns:
        returns the brick.

      • getRnd

        public static java.util.Random getRnd()
        getRnd Method is responsible for returning the Random object.
        Returns:
        returns a Random object.

      • getBorderColor

        public java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
        getBorderColor Method is responsible for returning border color of brick. Encapsulation of the border variable.
        Returns:
        returns border color of brick

      • getInnerColor

        public java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
        getBorderColor Method is responsible for returning border color of brick. Encapsulation of the border variable.

        returns border color of brick

      • findImpact

        public final int findImpact(BallController b)
        findImpact Method is responsible for determining the direction of the impact from the ball on the brick.
        Parameters:
        b - passing in the Object/Reference variable of the BallController class. Aggregation relationship.
        Returns:

      • isBroken

        public final boolean isBroken()
        isBroken Method is responsible for returning if the brick is broken or not. Encapsulation of the broken variable.
        Returns:
        returns the boolean value of broken variable.

      • repair

        public void repair()
        repair Method is responsible for repairing the brick. Sets the broken back to NOT broken. Sets strength to full capacity.

      • impact

        public void impact()
        impact Method is responsible to set the broken variable based on the brick's status. Also responsible for deducting the strength of a brick when an impact has occurred.

      • getStrength

        public int getStrength()
        Getter method for the strength variable. Encapsulation
        Returns:
        returns the strength value of the ball

      • setStrength

        public void setStrength(int strength)
        Setter method for the strength variable. Encapsulation Sets the value of the private variable strength
        Parameters:
        strength - strength value of brick
